---
title: "Ciara"
---

Ciara is a naturally gifted healer. She has been practicing Reiki from the Usui lineage for over 6 years and will be offering 20 minute sessions to the community at Growth! Reiki Energy Healing is an ancient modality that works with the vital life-force energy that surrounds us. Using light touch of her hands, the energy is guided to the chakras where it offers balance to the emotional, energetic and physical body
